og:title: The 4-Ingredient Appetizer I’m Making All Summer Long
og:description: You only need four ingredients to make this grilled feta-stuffed peppers recipe. They take under 30 minutes to make and are a fun and festive summertime appetizer or side dish.
Title: The 4-Ingredient Appetizer I’m Making All Summer Long
Author: Molly Allen
Description:
Grilled Feta-Stuffed Peppers Recipe (4 Ingredients, 25 Minutes)
Prep Time: 20 mins; Cook Time: 5 mins; Total Time: 25 mins; Servings: 8 servings; Yield: 24 half peppers
Ingredients: 8 ounces cream cheese, softened, 4 ounces feta cheese, crumbled, 1 pound sweet mini peppers (about 12), 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, 1/2 teaspoon salt, Vegetable or canola oil, for grill grates, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives, optional
Reviews: [{'name': 'Frank T', 'review': 'The filling portion was the perfect amount for 24 pepper halves. The cheese mixture was rich, but I loved the salty notes of the feta mixed with the cream cheese. Even though the chives are listed as optional, I think they add a crucial pop of color and flavor—especially for such a rich filling. The mini sweet peppers added a nice burst of sweetness. My favorite part was the charred edges of the peppers; they gave the dish a smoky flavor that I really enjoyed.'}, {'name': 'Hollis Tischner', 'review': 'Can these be done in the oven? If so, at what temp and how long? Thank you.'}]

og:title: The Best Dip Recipe on Planet Earth Is on the Back of This Bottle
og:description: Appetizers are the life of the party, and this hot Buffalo chicken dip is a winning recipe. It turns out the best recipe can be found on the back of Frank’s RedHot Original Cayenne Pepper Hot Sauce.
Title: The Best Dip Recipe on Planet Earth Is on the Back of This Bottle
Author: Sara Haas, RDN, LDN
Description: The Best Dip Recipe on Planet Earth Is on the Back of This Bottle

og:title: The 4-Ingredient Appetizer I’m Making for the Holidays This Year
og:description: All it takes is four ingredients to make a holiday appetizer no one will forget. Millionaire crackers combine buttery crackers and bacon for the perfect handheld bite.
Title: The 4-Ingredient Appetizer I’m Making for the Holidays This Year
Author: Nick Evans
Description: Millionaire Crackers Recipe (4 Ingredients)
Ingredients: 1 sleeve Club (or similar) crackers, about 38 crackers, 2 ounces cream cheese or Boursin cheese, room temperature, 8 strips bacon (not thick-cut), cut into fifths, 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, Crushed red pepper flakes, to taste, optional

og:title: These 4-Ingredient Yogurt Clusters Are the Best Snack I've Made in Years
og:description: Made with yogurt, fruit, and a magic chocolate shell, these yogurt clusters are a perfectly poppable snacky sweet that come together with no effort and minimal time.
Title: These 4-Ingredient Yogurt Clusters Are the Best Snack I've Made in Years
Author: Nea Arentzen
Description: 4-Ingredient Yogurt Clusters Recipe
Ingredients: 1 cup chopped strawberries (aim for 1/4-inch pieces), 1/4 cup vanilla yogurt, 1/2 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips, 2 tablespoons coconut oil, Flaky sea salt or kosher salt (optional)

og:title: My Grandma’s Snack Mix Is a Retro Classic You Need To Make
og:description: Loaded with Chex cereal, pretzels, nuts, Cheerios, and tons of flavor, this homemade snack mix recipe is always a big hit. I make my grandmother’s recipe for the holidays every year.
Title: My Grandma’s Snack Mix Is a Retro Classic You Need To Make
Author: Molly Adams
Description: Grandma Jean’s Snack Mix Recipe
Ingredients: 8 cups (12 to 13 ounces) Rice Chex Cereal, 4 cups (8 ounces) Wheat Chex Cereal, 3 cups (3 ounces) Cheerios, 2 cups (4 ounces) thin pretzel sticks, broken in half if needed, 2 (10.3-ounce) cans lightly salted mixed nuts (about 4 cups), 2 sticks (8 ounces) unsalted butter, 2 tablespoons, Worcestershire sauce, 2 teaspoons Lawry’s Seasoning Salt, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon onion powder, 3 to 4 dashes hot sauce (I use Frank’s Red Hot)

og:title: The Hot, Cheesy Dip I Make for Every Gathering
og:description: This hearty, flavorful queso fundido dip does double duty! The recipe makes a crowd-pleasing appetizer served with a side of tortilla chips, or you can use it to stuff your favorite tacos.
Title: The Hot, Cheesy Dip I Make for Every Gathering
Author: Samantha Saunion
Description:
Queso Fundido Recipe (25 Minutes, 4 Steps, One Pan)
Prep Time: 10 mins; Cook Time: 15 mins; Total Time: 25 mins; Servings: 4
to 6 servings
Ingredients: 1 pound ground fresh Mexican-style chorizo (without casing), 1 medium white onion, diced, 1 (4-ounce) can diced green chiles, 1 cup (4 ounces) shredded pepper jack cheese, 1 cup (4 ounces) shredded cheddar cheese, 1 cup (4 ounces) shredded Oaxaca cheese, 1/2 cup diced grape tomatoes, optional, 1/4 cup chopped cilantro, optional, 1 tablespoon crumbled queso fresco, optional, Tortilla chips, for serving

og:title: The Secret to the Best French Bread Pizza
og:description: You can’t beat the convenience of French bread pizza. Follow this recipe for the best-tasting French bread pizza possible, a fun option for lunch, dinner, or a snack.
Title: The Secret to the Best French Bread Pizza
Author: Devan Grimsrud
Description:
French Bread Pizza Recipe
Prep Time: 5 mins; Cook Time: 15 mins; Total Time: 20 mins; Servings: 4 servings
Ingredients: 1 loaf French bread (about 14 ounces), 4 tablespoons butter, room temperature, 3 tablespoons olive oil, plus more for drizzling, 1 cup canned crushed tomatoes (about half a 14-ounce can), 2 cloves garlic, 1 finely grated and 1 whole, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 1/2 teaspoon chili flakes, Kosher salt, to taste, 4 1/2 ounces fresh mozzarella cheese, 1 sprig fresh Italian basil

og:title: Bacon Is Great But Millionaire’s Bacon Is Better
og:description: Millionaire’s Bacon, a prized brunch or breakfast side dish, features thick-cut bacon glazed with syrup and coated in a flavorful brown sugar-spice rub. Best of all, this recipe can be made days in advance of your breakfast gathering!
Title: Bacon Is Great But Millionaire’s Bacon Is Better
Author: Irvin Lin
Description:
Millionaire’s Bacon Recipe
Prep Time: 10 mins; Cook Time: 25 mins; Total Time: 35 mins; Servings: 4
to 6 servings
Ingredients: 1/2 cup packed dark brown sugar, 1 1/2 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper, 1 teaspoon smoked paprika, 3/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes, 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger, 1 pound thick-cut bacon, center cut preferred, 3 tablespoons maple syrup
Reviews: [{'name': 'Frank T', 'review': 'As the recipe name suggests, the Millionaire's Bacon is rich, sweet, and decadent in all the best possible ways. It has a lot of flavor (smokey, sweet, barbecue-like notes), which is reminiscent of candied bacon and I love the spicy kick and twist to it.'}, {'name': 'Caryn Falcone', 'review': 'This was really delicious !Served it at a brunch and though I made 1 and a half pounds for four people I noticed people checking out the plate several times! I was lucky I got one piece! Will make again,not for me alone,because I would eat it all myself!!. Thanks for posting! Best wishes for a Happy Healthy New Year!!'}]

og:title: This Creamy, Easy Spinach Dip Takes Minutes to Whip Up
og:description: Classic spinach dip takes a detour to the Mediterranean in this lighter version made with creamy feta, yogurt, sour cream, and thawed frozen spinach. It’s a quick and easy dip to make for an impromptu appetizer.
Title: Easy Spinach Dip
Author: Sally Vargas
Description:
Easy Spinach Dip Recipe
Prep Time: 15 mins; Total Time: 15 mins; Servings: 8
to 10 servings; Yield: 4 cups
Ingredients: 1 (10 to 12-ounce) package chopped frozen spinach, thawed , 8 ounces creamy feta (such as Bulgarian or French feta), 1 cup plain whole milk Greek yogurt, 3/4 cup sour cream, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, 1 tablespoon grated yellow onion, 2 teaspoons finely grated lemon zest (from 1/2 large lemon), 1 tablespoon freshly squeezed lemon juice, 1/2 teaspoon coriander seed, ground in a mortar and pestle, or 1/4 teaspoon ground coriander, 1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste, 1 tablespoon olive oil, Salt, to taste, Aleppo pepper flakes, for garnish (optional), Crudites, pita triangles, crackers, chips, or vegetable strips, for serving
Reviews: [{'name': 'Mary', 'review': 'This has a lot of ingredients. Doesn't sound that easy.'}]

og:title: Love Garlic and Pickles? Make Pickled Garlic!
og:description: Pickled garlic has all of the delicious garlic flavor you’re looking for without the sharpness of raw garlic. This quick pickle recipe will keep for months in the fridge and is easy to adapt to suit your tastes.
Title: Pickled Garlic
Author: Laurel Randolph
Description:
Pickled Garlic (Quick Pickle Recipe)
Prep Time: 25 mins; Cook Time: 5 mins; Total Time: 30 mins; Servings: 16 servings; Yield: 1 pint
Ingredients: 6 medium heads garlic (or 2 cups peeled cloves), 1 cup white or apple cider vinegar (5% acidity), 1 cup filtered water, 1 1/2 teaspoons sugar, 1 teaspoon pickling, sea, or kosher salt, or to taste (not iodized), 1 teaspoon black peppercorns, 1 teaspoon coriander seeds, optional, 1/2 teaspoon mustard seeds, optional, 1/2 teaspoon cumin seeds, optional

og:title: Preserve Your Bounty With This All-Purpose Quick Pickling Recipe
og:description: Quick pickles, also known as refrigerator pickles, don’t require canning and will keep in your fridge for months.
Title: How To Make Quick Pickles
Author: Laurel Randolph
Description:
How to Make Quick Pickles (Any Vegetable!)
Prep Time: 20 mins; Cook Time: 5 mins; Total Time: 25 mins; Servings: 12 servings; Yield: 2 pints
Ingredients: 1 pound fresh vegetables like cucumbers, carrots, peppers, zucchini, or onions, 1 cup water, 1/2 cup white vinegar, 1/2 cup apple cider vinegar, 1 to 3 tablespoons sugar, 2 to 3 teaspoons pickling, sea, or kosher salt, 2 teaspoons dried whole spices, like black pepper, red pepper flakes, coriander, mustard seeds, and/or celery seed, 4 sprigs fresh dill, optional

og:title: Sweet Potato Latkes are a Fun Twist on Everyone’s Favorite Potato Pancake
og:description: For a twist on the classic potato latke, swap russets for colorful sweet potatoes. These slightly sweet but mostly savory latkes are crispy and delicious, especially with sour cream.
Title: Sweet Potato Latkes
Author: Micah Siva, RD
Description:
Sweet Potato Latkes Recipe
Prep Time: 15 mins; Cook Time: 25 mins; Total Time: 40 mins; Servings: 4
to 5 servings; Yield: 12
to 14 latkes
Ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds sweet potatoes (3 large or 4 to 5 medium sweet potatoes), 1/2 medium yellow onion, 1/4 cup all-purpose flour, 2 large eggs, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1 quart vegetable oil, for frying, 1/2 cup sour cream, for serving, optional
Reviews: [{'name': 'Stuart Harris', 'review': 'Can you air fry the latkes?\nI oil fry as little as possible.'}]

og:title: A Giant Sheet Pan Quesadilla Makes Any Night a Party
og:description: Make a giant quesadilla for a crowd on a sheet pan and let the oven do the work. It’s a 10-tortilla wonder, filled with beans and spicy ground beef and oozing with melted cheese.
Title: Loaded Sheet Pan Quesadillas
Author: Nick Evans
Description:
Loaded Sheet Pan Quesadillas Recipe
Prep Time: 20 mins; Cook Time: 40 mins; Total Time: 60 mins; Servings: 8 servings; Yield: 15 quesadilla pieces
Ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 pound lean ground beef, 1 yellow onion, cored and chopped, 1 red pepper, cored and chopped, 1 (15-ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed, 1 (5-ounce) can mild green chiles, 3 tablespoons taco seasoning, plus more to taste, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, plus more to taste, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, 1/4 cup water, Cooking spray, 10 medium (10-inch) flour tortillas, 16 ounces grated cheddar or Mexican blend cheese, Salsa, Sour cream, Guacamole

og:title: Serve Easy Homemade Cheese Straws at Your Next Party
og:description: Cheese straws are a classic Southern snack. A cross between a cheese cracker and a savory cookie, they only take a few ingredients to make and are delicious served with wine.
Title: Cheese Straws
Author: Laurel Randolph
Description:
Cheese Straws Recipe
Prep Time: 20 mins; Cook Time: 15 mins; Total Time: 35 mins; Servings: 12 servings; Yield: 50
to 70 cheese straws
Ingredients: 1 3/4 cups (228g) self-rising flour, 1/2 teaspoon smoked or sweet paprika, 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, 1/2 pound sharp or extra-sharp cheddar cheese, freshly grated, 1 stick (1/2 cup) unsalted butter, room temperature, 1 to 4 tablespoons water, or as needed
Reviews: [{'name': 'AP', 'review': 'Tried these and they are super yummy. Thank you'}, {'name': 'cielynne', 'review': "You are my hero. I came on here looking for a side dish for chili and now have a whole list of recipes I HAVE to try. But I've been looking for a cheese twist recipe for years. Thank you so much. I'm over the moon happy."}]

og:title: Shrimp Butter Will Be Your New Favorite Party Snack
og:description: Shrimp butter is a retro party snack recipe that’s part spread, part compound butter, and 100 percent delightful. An easy make-ahead appetizer, it’s heavenly smeared on saltines.
Title: Shrimp Butter
Author: Laura Manzano
Description:
Shrimp Butter Recipe
Prep Time: 35 mins; Cook Time: 10 mins; Total Time: 45 mins; Servings: 20 servings; Yield: 4 cups
Ingredients: 1 small white onion, finely minced (about 1/2 cup), 1 1/2 pounds large shrimp, shell on (see recipe note), 2 teaspoons kosher salt, plus more for salting the water, 1 pound unsalted butter, at room temperature , 2 teaspoons lemon zest, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce, 1/4 cup finely chopped fresh parsley, 1/4 cup finely chopped fresh dill, 1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 1/2 teaspoon celery seed
Reviews: [{'name': 'Adam ', 'review': "Why can't you use peeled and deveined shrimp? There are no use for the shell???"}, {'name': 'cta', 'review': 'I have a can of lump crabmeat cn I sub that instead.'}]

og:title: You Won't Be Able to Eat Just One of These Crispy Homemade Fried Pickles
og:description: The ultimate snack or easy appetizer. Salty, tangy, and crunchy, they’re especially good dipped in ranch dressing.
Title: Fried Pickles
Author: Nick Evans
Description:
Fried Pickles Recipe
Prep Time: 15 mins; Cook Time: 15 mins; Total Time: 30 mins; Servings: 4
to 6 servings
Ingredients: 1 (16-ounce) jar sliced pickles, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning, 3/4 teaspoon kosher salt, divided, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/2 cup buttermilk, 2 large eggs, 2 cups Italian seasoned breadcrumbs, 4 cups canola oil, for frying, Ranch dressing or blue cheese dressing, for dipping

og:title: Turn Mashed Potatoes Into Something Even Better: Potato Croquettes
og:description: Crispy outside and tender and rich inside, croquettes are to fry at home with our step-by-step recipe.
Title: Potato Croquettes
Author: Devan Grimsrud
Description:
Potato Croquettes Recipe
Prep Time: 30 mins; Cook Time: 40 mins; Cooling Time: 60 mins; Total Time: 2 hrs 10 mins; Servings: 6
to 8 servings; Yield: 18
to 20 croquettes
Ingredients: 1 pound (3 to 4) medium Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and quartered, 2 tablespoons kosher salt, 3 tablespoons unsalted butter, room temperature, 1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or to taste, 1/2 cup finely grated Parmesan cheese, 2 large egg yolks, 2 tablespoons finely chopped chives, 1 cup fine breadcrumbs, 2 large egg whites, Vegetable or canola oil, for frying, Salt, to taste

og:title: These Easy Baked Plantain Chips Beat Anything from a Store
og:description: Slicing into thin rounds on a mandoline and baking directly on a baking sheet is the key to making these golden, delicately crisp, baked plantain chips.
Title: Plantain Chips
Author: Kayla Hoang
Description:
Plantain Chips Recipe
Prep Time: 15 mins; Cook Time: 16 mins; Total Time: 31 mins; Servings: 6
to 8 servings; Yield: 3 cups plantain chips
Ingredients: 2 medium (about 9 inches) green plantains (about 9 1/2 ounces each), 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon kosher salt
Reviews: [{'name': 'Stephanie L', 'review': 'Super easy recipe. Using a mandoline ensured that all the slices were the same thickness. They baked up crispy, and the amount of salt was just right for me.'}]

og:title: Easy Whipped Ricotta Toast Is Creamy and Dreamy
og:description: When you whip ricotta, it magically becomes airier, creamier, and perfect for smearing on a sturdy slice of bread. A drizzle of lemony, thyme-y honey on top, and you’ll be spellbound!
Title: Easy Whipped Ricotta Toast
Author: Emily Weinberger
Description:
Easy Whipped Ricotta Toast Recipe
Prep Time: 15 mins; Cook Time: 10 mins; Total Time: 25 mins; Servings: 5 servings; Yield: 10 ricotta-topped toasts
Ingredients: 10 (1/2-inch) slices crusty sourdough bread , 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, plus more for bread, 1 1/2 teaspoons kosher salt, Freshly ground black pepper, 15 ounces whole milk ricotta, Finely grated zest of 1 lemon, 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, 1/3 cup honey, 1 teaspoon fresh thyme leaves, Flaky sea salt, for serving (optional)

og:title: I Wait All Year To Make This 4-Ingredient Strawberry Salsa
og:description: This sweet and juicy strawberry salsa recipe is a great way to use peak-season strawberries. It only needs four ingredients and ten minutes to make, and is delicious served with cinnamon-sugar tortilla or pita chips.
Title: I Wait All Year To Make This 4-Ingredient Strawberry Salsa
Author: Micah Siva, RD
Description: Strawberry Salsa Recipe (4 Ingredients, 10 Minutes)
Ingredients: 1 pound strawberries, hulled and diced, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint, 1 medium lime, 2 teaspoons honey, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt

og:title: I Can't Get Enough of This Homemade Trader Joe’s Cowboy Caviar
og:description: Make just one trip to our favorite grocery store, Trader Joe’s, for this big and bold homemade cowboy caviar. Don’t forget the chips!
Title: Trader Joe’s Homemade Cowboy Caviar
Author: Sara Tane
Description:
Trader Joe’s Homemade Cowboy Caviar Recipe
Prep Time: 20 mins; Total Time: 20 mins; Servings: 8
to 10 servings; Yield: 8 cups
Ingredients: 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice, 1 tablespoon Trader Joe’s Hot & Sweet Jalapeños pickling liquid, 2 teaspoons Trader Joe’s Everything But the Elote Seasoning Blend, 1/3 cup olive oil, Kosher salt, to taste, Freshly ground black pepper, to taste, 1 (15-ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed, 1 (15-ounce) can white or kidney beans, drained and rinsed, 1 medium red bell pepper, cored and diced, 1 medium yellow bell pepper, cored and diced, 5 scallions, trimmed and thinly sliced, 2 cups Trader Joe’s frozen roasted corn, thawed, 1 cup mini heirloom tomatoes, halved, 1/2 cup roughly chopped fresh cilantro, 1/4 cup Trader Joe’s Hot & Sweet Jalapeños, drained and chopped, 1 cup Trader Joe’s Giant Peruvian Inca Corn Salted Crunchy Snack, roughly chopped, Trader Joe’s Organic Elote Corn Chip Dippers, for serving
Reviews: [{'name': 'Michelle Henry', 'review': 'You say kidney beans but i see a can of Northern white bean and in the salad. So I will have 3 different beans, red, white and black? Doesnt seem like enough wet dressing. No vinegar?'}]

og:title: The 3-Ingredient Appetizer I Always Make for the Holidays
og:description: For a quick, easy, and festive appetizer, make my 3-ingredient smoked salmon dip recipe. Warmed in the oven, it’s delicious served with bread, crackers, or veggies for dipping.
Title: The 3-Ingredient Appetizer I Always Make for the Holidays
Author: Maren Ellingboe King
Description: 3-Ingredient Hot Smoked Salmon Dip Recipe
Ingredients: 8 ounces cream cheese,, room temperature, 4 to 6 ounces hot smoked salmon, flaked, 3 green onions, chopped, whites and dark greens divided, Kosher salt and ground pepper, to taste

og:title: The 3-Ingredient Retro Appetizer I Make When I’m Feeling Nostalgic
og:description: Spiced cottage cheese is served as a dip at Wisconsin supper clubs alongside crisp vegetable sticks and rye chips. This retro recipe is flavored with toasted caraway seeds and chopped green onions for a creamy, tangy dip that’s sure to be a crowd-pleaser.
Title: The 3-Ingredient Retro Appetizer I Make When I’m Feeling Nostalgic
Author: Ivy Manning
Description: Spiced Cottage Cheese Dip Recipe (3-Ingredient)
Ingredients: 1 teaspoon caraway seeds, 1 (16-ounce) tub full-fat, small curd cottage cheese, 2 green onions, trimmed and finely chopped, Salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste

og:title: The Easy Appetizer I Make Every Single New Year's Eve
og:description: My family makes this creamy, decadent hot crab dip every year for New Year’s Eve. It’s an elegant appetizer recipe for special occasions that’s secretly super easy to make—just stir it together and bake!
Title: The Easy Appetizer I Make Every Single New Year's Eve
Author: Nick Evans
Description: New Year’s Eve Hot Crab Dip Recipe
Ingredients: Nonstick cooking spray or softened butter, 8 ounces cream cheese, softened, 1 (6-ounce) can lump crab meat, drained well, 1 tablespoon minced chives, plus more for garnish, 2 teaspoons, Old Bay seasoning, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, 1 clove garlic, grated or minced, Toasted baguette or crackers, for serving

og:title: This S’Mores Dip Is a Major Upgrade to the Classic Treat
og:description: And I plan to make it all year round because it only takes three ingredients and less than 15 minutes to make enough s'mores for a crowd.
Title: S'Mores Dip
Author: Abby Rose Notarnicola
Description:
S'Mores Dip Recipe
Prep Time: 5 mins; Cook Time: 8 mins; Total Time: 13 mins; Servings: 8
to 10 Servings; Yield: 2 cups
Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups semi-sweet chocolate chips, 2 cups mini marshmallows, Graham crackers, for dipping

og:title: Tomato Pie Dip Packs All of the Flavors Without All the Work
og:description: This tomato pie dip recipe takes the messy nature of tomato pie and turns it into an asset! Bake roasted cherry tomatoes with a cream cheese, mayo, cheddar, and herb base for an oozy, tangy dip everyone will love!
Title: Tomato Pie Dip
Author: Sara Bir
Description:
Tomato Pie Dip Recipe
Prep Time: 15 mins; Cook Time: 60 mins; Rest Time: 15 mins; Total Time: 90 mins; Servings: 4 servings; Yield: 2 2/3 cups
Ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds multi-colored cherry tomatoes (about 4 cups), halved, divided, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, 1 (8-ounce) package cream cheese, softened, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 1/4 teaspoon onion powder, 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, plus more for garnish, 6 ounces sharp cheddar cheese, shredded, divided (about 1 1/2 cups), 1 tablespoon chopped Calabrian or pimento peppers, 1/2 teaspoon dried basil, 1 (10-ounce) baguette, 4 tablespoons salted butter, melted , Thinly sliced green onions, for garnish
Reviews: [{'name': 'NK', 'review': 'Super delicious. Took it for a bridal shower pot luck in June. Was gone in 5 mins!!!! Now I am being asked to bring in larger quantity for Thanksgiving!!! og:title: This Layered Whipped Goat Cheese Dip Is What Dreams Are Made Of
og:description: This easy make-ahead whipped goat cheese dip is topped with bacon and pistachios for a salty crunch. Dried fruit and a drizzle of honey add a touch of sweetness.
Title: Whipped Goat Cheese Dip
Author: Nick Evans
Description:
Whipped Goat Cheese Dip Recipe
Prep Time: 10 mins; Cook Time: 0 mins; Total Time: 10 mins; Servings: 6
to 8 servings
Ingredients: 10 ounces goat cheese, 1/4 cup plain whole milk yogurt, 1/4 cup whole milk, 1/2 lemon, juiced, Pinch kosher salt, 4 slices bacon, cooked until crisp, 2 tablespoons honey, 2 tablespoons golden raisins, 2 tablespoons chopped pistachios, 2 tablespoons chopped dates or figs, 1 tablespoon sunflower seeds, 1 tablespoon chives, Pita chips, for serving

og:title: Make Bubbly Hot Crab Dip Recipe for Your Next Party
og:description: A MUST for your holiday party, Super Bowl party, or dinner party. Make it ahead and then bake until bubbly when you're ready to serve!
Title: Hot Crab Dip
Author: Elise Bauer
Ingredients: 1 (8-ounce) package cream cheese, softened to room temperature, 1/3 cup mayonnaise, 2 teaspoons lemon juice, 1 tablespoon water, 2 green onions, sliced, greens included, 3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, or 1 tablespoon dried parsley, 1 tablespoon prepared horseradish, 1/4 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 teaspoon Tabasco, or more to taste, 1/2 cup slivered almonds, 1 cup fresh lump crab meat (or canned crab meat)

og:title: How to Make Eggplant Caviar Dip
og:description: Everyone will love this smoky eggplant dip that makes a perfect appetizer spread over crackers or bread.
Title: Eggplant Caviar
Author: Elise Bauer
Description:
Eggplant Caviar Recipe
Prep Time: 5 mins; Cook Time: 45 mins; Total Time: 50 mins; Servings: 6
to 8 servings; Yield: 2
to 3 cups
Ingredients: 2 medium globe eggplants (about 2 pounds or 900g total), 5 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, divided, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, 1 medium red bell pepper, 3 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon balsamic vinegar, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, 2 tablespoons minced fresh basil, 1/8 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper

og:title: Cucumber Mint Raita Is My Favorite Summer Condiment
og:description: Learn how to make the best, cool and refreshing condiment for hot and spicy dishes, with just yogurt, cumin, cucumber, and mint. It's easy and incredibly versatile.
Title: Cucumber Mint Raita
Author: Elise Bauer
Description:
Cucumber Mint Raita Recipe
Prep Time: 10 mins; Total Time: 10 mins; Servings: 10 servings; Yield: 2 1/2 cups

Author: Elise Bauer
Description:
Best Deviled Eggs Recipe

og:title: Easy, Cheesy Chili Dip Is My New Favorite Comfort Food

Easy Chili Dip Recipe

to 6 servings; Yield: 3 cups

og:title: This Trinidadian Boiled Corn Will Be a New Summer Favorite!
og:description: Ready for a corn on the cob recipe like no other? Trinidadian boiled corn is simmered in a flavorful broth of coconut milk, fiery habanero peppers, and fresh herbs until it clings to every kernel.

Trinidadian Boiled Corn Recipe

og:title: These Easy Pickled Watermelon Rinds Are a Delicious, No-Waste Summer Snack
og:description: Quick-pickled watermelon rinds are a perfect sweet, tart, and sour snack for summer. This easy recipe is a great place to start if you're new to pickling, and is a fun way to reduce waste.
Title: Pickled Watermelon Rinds
Author: Lauren Paige Richeson

Pickled Watermelon Rinds Recipe

Ingredients: 1 medium watermelon (about 5 pounds), 1 cup apple cider vinegar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 1/2 cups water, 2 tablespoons sea salt, 1 cup granulated sugar, 1 tablespoon pickling spice, homemade or store-bought, 1/2 teaspoon whole allspice berries, 1/2 teaspoon peppercorns

og:title: Make Restaurant-Worthy Fried Brussels Sprouts at Home
og:description: Fried Brussels sprouts are crispy outside, tender inside! You can easily make this restaurant favorite at home to serve as an appetizer or side dish.
Title: Fried Brussels Sprouts
Author: Coco Morante
Description:
Fried Brussels Sprouts Recipe
Prep Time: 20 mins; Cook Time: 16 mins; Total Time: 36 mins; Servings: 6 servings

Reviews: [{'name': 'Dan S', 'review': "This recipe works like a charm. You'll end up with the crispiest, most tender brussels sprouts, just like you'd get at a restaurant. og:title: Celebrate Lunar New Year With Classic Pork and Chive Dumplings
og:description: Pork and chive is a classic Chinese dumpling filling. Whether you’re making dumplings for Lunar New Year or a weeknight dinner, this recipe can be made in advance and freezes great.
Title: Pork and Chive Dumplings
Author: Frank Tiu
Description:
Pork and Chive Dumplings Recipe
Prep Time: 40 mins; Cook Time: 25 mins; Total Time: 65 mins; Servings: 6
to 8 servings; Yield: 50 dumplings
Ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds ground pork, 4 ounces Chinese chives, chopped (about 1/2 cup), 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 2 tablespoons sesame oil, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 2 teaspoons sugar, 1 package square wonton wrappers (50 to 60 wrappers), 1/4 cup water, or as needed, to seal, 3 tablespoons Chinese black vinegar, 1/2 teaspoon sugar, Thinly sliced fresh ginger, optional
Reviews: [{'name': 'Munni P', 'review': 'Made to share with my sister and friends for dinner, and everyone LOVED IT! The dumplings were lighter in flavor, so you can taste the natural flavors of the pork and the chives. Loved how the moisture from the cooked pork reabsorbed into the dumplings as they cooled, resulting in a supple, juicy bite. \n\nEating it with the vinegar sauce was even better! The clean flavor from the sauce enhanced the light flavor of the pork without overpowering it. I especially loved it with the thin ginger pieces; it provided a zing and cut through the fattiness from the pork. All in all, a great dumpling recipe!'}]

og:title: Vegan Nachos Might Be Even Better Than the Original
og:description: Nachos are the ultimate crowd-pleaser. These vegan nachos are sure to thrill vegetarians, vegans, and meat-eaters alike with creamy queso, sofritas, beans, salsa, and guacamole. They’re easy to customize, too.
Title: Vegan Nachos
Author: Laurel Randolph

Vegan Nachos Recipe

og:title: Vegan Chicken Nuggets are Even More Satisfying Than Fast Food

Vegan Chicken Nuggets Recipe

to 6 servings; Yield: 16 nuggets

og:title: Homemade Swedish Meatballs That Are Way Better Than IKEA

Description: Jalapeño Popper Dip Recipe
Ingredients: 1 pound bacon, 8 ounces cream cheese,, softened to room temperature, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 3/4 cup sliced pickled jalapeños (about 3 ounces), chopped fine, plus 1 tablespoon brine (or more chopped peppers to taste), 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, Nonstick cooking spray, 1/2 cup panko bread crumbs, 3 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted and cooled, 2 green onions, trimmed and sliced, optional, Chips or crackers for serving

og:title: My 4-Ingredient Dessert Is No-Cook and Incredibly Nostalgic
og:description: This confetti yogurt frosting is made from just three ingredients—Greek yogurt, instant vanilla pudding mix, and colorful sprinkles—and is perfect for dipping into with graham crackers, cookies, or fruit. The recipe is a healthy-ish twist on classic Dunkaroos, and comes together in just five minutes.
Title: My 4-Ingredient Dessert Is No-Cook and Incredibly Nostalgic
Author: Coco Morante
Description: Confetti Yogurt Frosting Recipe (4 Ingredients, 5 Minutes)
Ingredients: 2 cups plain whole-milk Greek yogurt, 6 tablespoons (half a 5.1-ounce package) Jell-O Instant Vanilla Pudding Mix, 2 tablespoons rainbow sprinkles, For serving: graham crackers, animal crackers, and/or sliced apples

og:title: The Easy Appetizer I Make Every Game Day
og:description: Bratwurst sausages are a classic choice for game day parties or tailgating, but they need a fair amount of attention and time to cook properly. This recipe for bratwurst sliders makes feeding a crowd much easier (and way cuter, too!).
Title: The Easy Appetizer I Make Every Game Day
Author: Ivy Manning
Description:
Bratwurst Sliders Recipe
Prep Time: 20 mins; Cook Time: 40 mins; Total Time: 60 mins; Servings: 6
to 8 servings; Yield: 18 sliders
Ingredients: 1/2 bottle lager or pilsner beer (or NA beer if avoiding alcohol), optional, 2 thin slices yellow onion, optional, 2 (19-ounce) packages fresh bratwurst, Freshly ground black pepper, to taste, 18 King’s Hawaiian sweet slider buns or pretzel slider buns, 1 cup whole grain mustard, 2 tablespoons canola oil, divided, 1 heaping cup well-drained sauerkraut
Reviews: [{'name': 'MADONNA CHERRY', 'review': 'They are so good everyone love.'}, {'name': 'Munni P', 'review': 'This tasted exactly as you'd expect - a sweet Hawaiian bun paired with bratwurst, spicy whole mustard, and sour sauerkraut. Truly can't go wrong with that flavor combination, and it was super easy to make! I ended up soaking half of the patties in the beer mixture, and both the soaked and unsoaked brats tasted delicious. og:title: Forget Deviled Eggs—Make This Dip Instead
og:description: Instead of painstakingly making perfect deviled eggs, make this easy, creamy dip instead. It has all of the flavors you want without the fuss.
Title: Forget Deviled Eggs—Make This Dip Instead
Author: Stephanie A Ganz
Description:
Deviled Egg Dip (25 Minutes)
Prep Time: 10 mins; Cook Time: 15 mins; Total Time: 25 mins; Servings: 8
to 12 servings; Yield: 2 cups
Ingredients: 6 large eggs, 4 ounces cream cheese, softened, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons finely chopped cornichons or dill pickles, 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard, 1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar, 1 teaspoon hot sauce, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, Potato chips, crackers, or crudites for serving, Optional garnishes: paprika, finely chopped chives, finely chopped cooked bacon
Reviews: [{'name': 'Coco M', 'review': 'This was so good and so much easier and faster than making deviled eggs! Mya family enjoyed it with crudités, and I'm looking forward to having the leftovers as an open-face sandwich'}]

og:title: I Make These 3-Ingredient Ranch Deviled Eggs On Repeat
og:description: Adding ranch seasoning mix to mayo and egg yolks makes an amazing deviled egg filling in this 3-ingredient ranch deviled eggs recipe. They’re a zesty, tangy snack or appetizer to share.
Title: I Make These 3-Ingredient Ranch Deviled Eggs On Repeat
Author: Claudia Cash
Description: Ranch Deviled Eggs Recipe (3 Ingredients, 20 Minutes)
Ingredients: 6 large eggs, washed if freshly laid, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 1 to 2 tablespoons, ranch seasoning mix, , to taste

og:title: The 5-Minute Snack I've Been Eating Since Childhood
og:description: This tahini cinnamon toast is the quickest way to comfort that I know. Made with just a few simple pantry ingredients, it’s sweet, buttery, and full of cinnamon spice. I add tahini for even more goodness.
Title: The 5-Minute Snack I've Been Eating Since Childhood
Author: Micah Siva, RD
Description: Tahini Cinnamon Toast Recipe (5 Minutes)
Ingredients: 1 slice of bread (sourdough, brioche, or white bread work best), 1 tablespoon salted butter, at room temperature, 1 teaspoon granulated sugar, 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon, Pinch of kosher salt, 1 tablespoon tahini, 2 teaspoons date syrup, honey, or maple syrup

og:title: Corn Oysters Are the Retro Summer Dish You Need to Make
og:description: Corn oysters are bite-sized fried corn fritters named for their oyster-like shape. This recipe is bursting with sweet corn flavor and is a perfect appetizer or light main to serve during peak corn season.
Title: Corn Oysters Are the Retro Summer Dish You Need to Make
Author: Afton Cyrus and Nicole Hopper
Description:
Corn Oysters Recipe
Prep Time: 15 mins; Cook Time: 20 mins; Total Time: 35 mins; Servings: 8
to 9 servings; Yield: 36 fritters
Ingredients: 4 medium ears fresh sweet corn, 4 green onions, thinly sliced, 2 large eggs, beaten, 1 cup (125g) all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon paprika, 1/4 cup neutral oil, plus more as needed, Flaky salt, for serving, optional
